thread.section_title: Live Feed Wire - ASEAN News Today - EIN Presswire
thread.title: CHURCH CALENDAR 060124

title: CHURCH CALENDAR 060124
text: JUNE 1 9TH YEAR GOSPEL JUBILEE SINGING WITH FAITHFUL 2 AND OTHERS—Saturday, June 1, 1-4 p.m. 9th Year Gospel Jubilee Singing. Open Bible Freewill Baptist Church, 6648 Daffodil Lane, Bluff City, Tenn. Singers are: Faithful 2, Cause One, Blood Bought, Life Way Singers, Vision of Calvary and Danny Owen. Afterwards: Hotdog, chips and drink for a donation. For more information, call 423-646-0307 or 713-498-1191 or visit www.faithful2.org . JUNE 2 SINGING WITH FAITHFUL 2—Sunday, June 2, 11 a.m. St. John Freewill Baptist Church, 178 Old Rock Quarry Road, Roan Mountain, Tenn. For more information, call 713-498-1191 or visit www.faithful2.org . SINGING WITH FAITHFUL 2—Sunday, June 2, 6 p.m. Faith Temple Church, 278 North Rufe Taylor Road, Greeneville, Tenn. For more information, call 713-498-1191 or visit www.faithful2.org . People are also reading… JUNE 3 MARION CHURCH OF THE NAZARENE SPECIAL-NEEDS VBS—Marion Church of the Nazarene, 229 W. Coyner Ave., will have Special-Needs Vacation Bible School (all ages welcome) from Monday, June 3, through Friday, June 7, from 6-7 p.m. Mainstream VBS will be held Sunday, June 9, through Friday, June 14, from 6-8:30 p.m. This year’s theme is ‘The Great Jungle Journey: An Epic Cruise from Genesis to Revelation.’ There will be Bible lessons, Bible memory, music, crafts, recreation, & plenty of snacks. Join us for an epic adventure! For more information, call 276-378-0423. JUNE 4 MARION CHURCH OF THE NAZARENE SPECIAL-NEEDS VBS—Marion Church of the Nazarene, 229 W. Coyner Ave., will have Special-Needs Vacation Bible School (all ages welcome) from Monday, June 3, through Friday, June 7, from 6-7 p.m. Mainstream VBS will be held Sunday, June 9, through Friday, June 14, from 6-8:30 p.m. This year’s theme is ‘The Great Jungle Journey: An Epic Cruise from Genesis to Revelation.’ There will be Bible lessons, Bible memory, music, crafts, recreation, & plenty of snacks. Join us for an epic adventure! For more information, call 276-378-0423. JUNE 5 AL-ANON—A support group for friends and family of alcoholics and addicts meeting at 7 p.m. every Wednesday in the basement of Lebanon United Methodist Church in Elk Creek, Virginia. For more information, call 276-655-4941. MARION CHURCH OF THE NAZARENE SPECIAL-NEEDS VBS—Marion Church of the Nazarene, 229 W. SUICIDE SURVIVORS SUPPORT GROUP OF THE TRI-CITIES—Navigating the Ocean of Grief after the Suicide Death of a Loved One, facilitated by Barbara Sims, Ph.D., who lost her son, Christopher Michael Price, to suicide on January 5, 2018. We meet the second Tuesday of each month at the Summit Leadership offices, 3515 Bristol Highway, Johnson City, TN, 6-7 p.m. To get on the contact list for meeting notices or for additional information about this support group, contact Barb Sims at [barb@bsims.net](mailto:barb@bsims.net).
